entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: In a discussion thread on November 15, 2013, Wladimir proposed a solution to address the issue of clutter in displaying multiple boxes for unit conversion. Instead, he suggested that the verification dialog should show the totals in all three units, which would allow people to learn about other units without having to choose them consciously. This approach was well received and considered a good idea.
